DOC.brief_summary: The goal study : - determine combination two drug , motexafin gadolinium pemetrexed , may effective treatment patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) one previous chemotherapy regimen include platinum contain drug cisplatin carboplatin . - assess response treatment patient NSCLC six month begin study treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Motexafin Gadolinium Pemetrexed ( AlimtaÂ® ) Second Line Treatment Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Stage IIIb , metastatic , recurrent NSCLC patient receive one prior platinumbased chemotherapy regimen ECOG performance status score 0 1 Laboratory value indicate inadequate function bone marrow , liver , kidney Symptomatic uncontrolled brain metastasis Evidence meningeal metastasis > 1 prior regimen ( count adjuvant neoadjuvant cytotoxic chemotherapy complete > 12 month prior regiment ) Medical condition would increase risk treat motexafin gadolinium impair ability complete study procedure assessment
